name: PShotS
description:
HOLD FOR THE WINNING SHOT! Are You the Next Pop Shot! Pro?
Become the MVP of the league in Pop Shot! Soccer, the latest ‘Pop Shot!’ adventure designed for simplicity and competition! Hold, strike and pass your way to becoming the World’s Best!

PLAY WITH YOUR NATIONAL TEAM
Packed with over 65 teams, all with exclusive football kits, relive the excitement of the World Cup once more with the Pop Shot! universe!

PRACTICE MAKES PERFECT
Train up using inventive one-touch gameplay. Build pressure on the ball and release to make a perfect pass and score that match-winning goal!

KEEPIE-UPPIE
Pass, strike and score your way to the highest points on the leaderboard. Can you beat your friends?

WAIT, THAT’S NOT A SOCCER BALL?!
From cupcakes to melons, Pop Shot! Soccer is bursting with wacky soccer balls to unlock and play with!

UNLIMITED PLAY? ONE-TIME UNLOCK AND REMOVE ALL ADS
Buy your Season Ticket and purchase the full game with a one-off unlock!

JOIN THE FULL FAT COMMUNITY
Like: facebook.com/fullfatgames
Follow: Instagram.com/fullfatgames
Follow: twitter.com/fullfatgames
Subscribe: youtube.com/fullfatgames
